body:
What is your IGN and team? ImRaging and I'm one of the leaders in Apollo

How many tournaments have you participated in? T1 - T5 including the league

Any team in particular you'd like to face off against? Bulldogs and Fussion, haven't played them
before so it will be interesting to see how much we get b0ned :))))))))))))))

Any team you don't want to face off against?  Probably Horizon for obvious reasons to most ;)

How do you think you'll do this time around? well we are cursed with 3rd place so i hope we're still cursed

Any teams you have a rivalry with? pvpteam! seriously probably Horizon since i guess thats the team we've scrimmed against most recently and tournaments is only where it matters so it will be interesting to see who gets the bragging rights at the end.

What do you think is your team's best strength, and your best strength alone? I just think we all get along together other than ryan because he's a year behind in memes and still dabs. We're also pretty strong at bow other than zeus xd

What do you think is your team's worst weakness, and your worst weakness alone? all of us (especially legoche) cheated in the past so it will be hard getting used to playing legit!

What have you done to prepare? scrimmed a few times, ya boy falcon has not started strats ;-; 

Anything you'd like to say to your opponents? please dont turn up because we want the automatic wins!
